description.p: Task Flow is a versatile application providing various task management utilities in one convenient package.
Provides multiple tools for task management including:

screenshot.caption: Home screen with task overview and quick access to management tools
Project management view for organizing and tracking multiple projects
Calendar view for scheduling tasks and managing deadlines
Statistics dashboard for tracking productivity and task completion
Synchronization settings for cloud storage and cross-device access

description.p: Included both private and shared tasks in the calendar display.
Implemented a 5-second task highlight effect when redirecting from the calendar to the task list.
Added automatic scrolling to ensure the target task is within the visible area upon redirection.
Fixed 404 error when navigating to Admin page from header menu.
Fixed Rust backend compilation error regarding missing codeExpiresAt field.
Added codeExpiresAt field to user models for email verification support.
Implemented #[serde(default)] for user model fields to ensure backward compatibility with existing database records and fix login redirect loops.
Enhanced real-time data synchronization with WebSocket integration for improved collaborative task management and shared project updates.
Implemented Angular signals throughout the application for better reactivity and performance in task management components.
Added comprehensive admin features including category records management and bulk selection capabilities for better data administration.
Improved task sharing functionality with enhanced privacy controls, ownership verification, and query parameter handling.
Refactored routing system with flattened nested routes and enhanced component safety for better navigation experience.
Added sync metadata support across statistics, tasks, and subtasks for better data tracking and synchronization.
Integrated activity logging system for comprehensive task activity monitoring and history tracking.
Enhanced form validation and UI responsiveness with improved date handling, optional fields, and better mobile layouts.
Optimized API services with flexible filter parameters and standardized method calls for improved maintainability.
Updated dependencies and Rust code formatting for better performance and security.
Enhanced user experience with mobile-responsive calendar layout and improved component designs
Added responsive calendar grid for mobile devices with touch-friendly interface
Simplified admin view layout structure for better performance
Improved component responsiveness and removed redundant creator information
Implemented reactive syncing status handling in header
Redesigned about page with modern card-based layout
Enhanced authentication with local data caching
Added password visibility toggles and improved form controls
Updated styling and layout consistency across components
Added max height and vertical scroll to categories list in stats page
Changed the application collector via Github Action
The style of the progress bar in the Todo and Task elements has been changed: segments of each status are now displayed.
Changed the logic for storing authorization
Changed the code styles in rust
Deep-link listening code removed
Added the authorization verification feature to all pages
The logic of downloading a new version of the application has been changed
The page layout has been changed
Fixed an issue with opening a page with subtasks after deletion
Fixed an error loading data for statistics and data synchronization
Fixed the Flatpak collector app via Github Action
Changed the types of statuses for tasks/subtasks
The description field in the task/subtask management forms is now optional.
Changed the position and size of the radio button for tasks/subtasks.

Added logic for the end date field: now it can only be specified if there is a start date, if the start date is deleted, then the end date of the task/subtask is also deleted, and now you cannot select the end date before the start date.
Added a date deletion button in the form for editing tasks/subtasks.
Implemented logic so that new tasks/subtasks are shown first.
Added logic for sorting tasks/subtasks so that completed entries are after those not completed in the list.
The read-only property is set for fields with dates.
Fixed block markup on the task page.
Added new features and improved functionality
